summary: An irresponsible and childish ex-con befriends a girl with cerebral palsy and develops a progressively stronger bond with her.
cast: Kyung-gu Sol|Moon So-Ri|Nae-sang Ahn|Seung-wan Ryoo|Kwi-Jung Choo|Jin-gu Kim|Byung-ho Son|Ga-hyun Yun|Myung-shin Park|Kyung-geun Park|Dae-gwan Han|Jin-seob Han|Seo-hie Ko
title: Oasis
